StockTrade - Class in com.supersimplestocks.data
This class represents a stock trade (buy or sell).

StockTradeExec - Class in com.supersimplestocks.business
A console-based interface that allows the user to execute operations on the stock market, like retrieving data (dividend yield, price/earnings ratio, Volume Weighted Stock Price), to buy and sell shares and to calculate the All Share Index.
StockTradeExec() - Constructor for class com.supersimplestocks.business.StockTradeExec
Constructor
StockTradeTest - Class in com.supersimplestocks.test
Test class to test the stock trading functionality.
StockTradeTest() - Constructor for class com.supersimplestocks.test.StockTradeTest
 
StockTradeUtil - Class in com.supersimplestocks.business
A class that executes business operations (buy, sell) on the stock exchange and retrieves information about the stocks such as dividend yield, P/E ratio, Volume Weighted Stock Price for a given stock based on trades in the 5 minutes and All Share Index.
StockTradeUtil(Map<String, Stock>) - Constructor for class com.supersimplestocks.business.StockTradeUtil
Constructor.
StockType - Enum in com.supersimplestocks.data
Stock types: Common and Preferred
